channel.title: Comments for page "Black Stones"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Black Stones"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: Seems like there are ony 2 categories: with teammate(s)/without them and it's personal random for every player in group of events he/she chosed :)

item.title: Is it really random?
item.content:encoded:
One of the options:
*You feel like you would have had more fun if your teammates weren't harshing your groove.. (randomly happen with teammates)
has occured several times to me, but always when I had made 0 team changes that day.
If I made just 1 chance I would get the +1 team change per teammate result (which set current at -2)

EDIT: I just got the other option with 0 team changes that day. So it does not seem to be an aspect of this.
